item.name: Get paginated list of FAQ categories

body.raw:
{
    "question": {
        "en": "How do I reset my password?",
        "nl": "Hoe reset ik mijn wachtwoord?",
        "de": "Wie setze ich mein Passwort zurck?",
        "fr": "Comment rinitialiser mon mot de passe?",
        "es": "Cmo restablezco mi contrasea?"
    },
    "answer": {
        "en": "You can reset your password by clicking on the Forgot Password link on the login page. You will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.",
        "nl": "U kunt uw wachtwoord opnieuw instellen door op de link Wachtwoord vergeten op de aanmeldpagina te klikken. U ontvangt een e-mail met instructies om uw wachtwoord opnieuw in te stellen.",
        "de": "Sie knnen Ihr Passwort zurcksetzen, indem Sie auf der Anmeldeseite auf den Link Passwort vergessen klicken. Sie erhalten eine E-Mail mit Anweisungen zum Zurcksetzen Ihres Passworts.",
        "fr": "Vous pouvez rinitialiser votre mot de passe en cliquant sur le lien Mot de passe oubli sur la page de connexion. Vous recevrez un e-mail avec des instructions pour rinitialiser votre mot de passe.",
        "es": "Puede restablecer su contrasea haciendo clic en el enlace Olvid su contrasea? en la pgina de inicio de sesin. Recibir un correo electrnico con instrucciones para restablecer su contrasea."
    },
    "categoryId": "6942951fa07355637e126391",
    "tags": [
        "password",
        "account",
        "security"
    ],
    "sortOrder": 1,
    "status": "Active",
    "isActive": true
}

item.name: Get paginated list of blog categories
Get paginated list of blogs with filters

formdata.value: {"en": "My First Blog Post", "nl": "Mijn Eerste Blogpost", "de": "Mein erster Blogbeitrag", "fr": "Mon premier article de blog", "es": "Mi primera publicacin de blog"}

{"en": "# Hello World

This is **bold** text and *italic* text.

- List item 1
- List item 2

[Click here](https://example.com)", "nl": "# Hallo Wereld

Dit is **vetgedrukte** tekst.", "de": "# Hallo Welt

Dies ist **fett** gedruckter Text.", "fr": "# Bonjour le monde

Ceci est du texte **gras**.", "es": "# Hola Mundo

Este es texto **negrita**."}
{"metaTitle": "First Blog SEO Title", "metaSlug": "my-first-blog-post", "metaDescription": "This is the meta description"}
{"en": "Updated Blog Title", "nl": "Bijgewerkte blogtitel", "de": "Aktualisierter Blogtitel", "fr": "Titre du blog mis  jour", "es": "Ttulo del blog actualizado"}

formdata.value: Monarch gives you all the tools to plan, track, and improve your financial life.
Answer questions about your health, lifestyle, and wellness goals.
Shop essentials, explore wellness, personalize vitamins for daily balance, and build healthier habits for lasting vitality.
We're on a mission for health - empowering you to become an active participant in your own wellbeing.
We're here to simplify your wellness routine with effective, evidence-backed formulas you can trust.
Connect with certified health professionals for trusted, personalized advice tailored to your unique wellness needs.
Within minutes you will receive a personalized vitamin plan completely tailored to you\!
Experts recommend at least 90 days of consistent use of supplements for optimal results.
Every formula is made with rigorously tested, high-quality ingredients to ensure safety and effectiveness.
The Viteezy Scientific Committee and our R&D team put their combined expertise, research and unique ever-changing technology into creating exceptional products.
Viteezy design solutions backed by 10,000+ trials and studies.
We follow strict protocols and lab testing to ensure safe, trusted results.
Viteezy analyze user data to prove and improve solutions.
We're here for you every step of your health journey, with over 9,000 positive reviews and counting\!
Discover expert tips and guides to improve your daily wellbeing for a healthier tomorrow
Find clear, simple answers to common questions and understand how Health Compass supports you
Why do you use so much plastic?
When does the direct debit take place?
How many sachets do I have per day?

- Expert in Node.js
- Loves TypeScript
- Full-stack developer","nl":"# Over John

- Houdt van TypeScript

- Aime TypeScript
- Dveloppeur full-stack","es":"# Acerca de John

John es un **desarrollador senior** con ms de 10 aos de experiencia.

- Le encanta TypeScript
- Desarrollador full-stack"}

formdata.value: We are passionate about innovation and excellence
We zijn gepassioneerd over innovatie en excellentie
Wir sind leidenschaftlich ber Innovation und Exzellenz
Nous sommes passionns par l'innovation et l'excellence
Estamos apasionados por la innovacin y la excelencia
Innovatie drijft alles wat we doen.
Innovation treibt alles an, was wir tun.
L'innovation motive tout ce que nous faisons.
La innovacin impulsa todo lo que hacemos.
Con ms de 20 aos de experiencia
The brilliant minds behind our success
De briljante geesten achter ons succes
Die brillanten Kpfe hinter unserem Erfolg
Les esprits brillants derrire notre succs
Las mentes brillantes detrs de nuestro xito
